item.title: Glitch
item.dc:creator: @akman15324 akman15324
item.description:
@akman15324 wrote:

My dragon claws and ags are glitched on my server. The specials dont work untill you die with them. This could cause some frustration with my players, so i need to fix it.
My ags code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){
setAnimation(3547);
specialAmount -= 50;
getHit(5);
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee) + misc.random(20);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
specGFX(655);
}
My claw code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6587 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAmount -= 50;
dclaws = 3;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
startAnimation(2068);
specOn = false;
}

Read full topic
